# Information

**Between 2022 and 2024** I co-organized with [Maxim Mai](https://maxim-mai.github.io/) the [weekly physics seminars](https://indico.hiskp.uni-bonn.de/category/35/) at the [Helmholtz Institute for Radiation and Nuclear Physics (HISKP), at the University of Bonn](https://www.hiskp.uni-bonn.de/).
Our work consisted in inviting speakers, broadcasting the events and chairing the sessions.
